scriptures.verse: For this is the whole duty of man, that we fear Yah and keep his commandments and his commandments are not grievous.
scriptures.action: Read Exodus 20 and find at least two commandments you can do better with

scriptures.verse: Sin is the transgression of the law
scriptures.action: Read a scripture from the book of Deuteronomy and try to find a law you are not currently aware of.

scriptures.verse: For this is the love of Yah, that we keep his commandments
scriptures.action: How can we show Yah that we love him more today?

scriptures.verse: We shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceeds from Yah
scriptures.action: Go back into the Torah (Genesis-Deuteronomy) and find some of Yah's words that you may not be familiar with.

scriptures.verse: Humble yourselves therefore under the mighty hand of Elohim, that he may exalt you in due time:
scriptures.action: How can you show more humility today?

scriptures.verse: Have not I commanded thee? Be strong and of a good courage; be not afraid, neither be thou dismayed: for the Yah your Elohim is with thee whithersoever thou goest.
scriptures.action: When was the last time you didnt show courage? How can you change that next time?

scriptures.verse: Blessed are they that keep his testimonies, and that seek him with the whole heart.
scriptures.action: How can you seek Yah more today?

scriptures.verse: I remembered thy judgments of old, O Yah; and have comforted myself.
scriptures.action: What is one of Yah's wonders that you can think about to comfort yourself?

scriptures.verse: I thought on my ways, and turned my feet unto thy testimonies.
scriptures.action: What is one way you can turn your feet back to the testimonies of Yah?

scriptures.verse: I made haste, and delayed not to keep thy commandments.
scriptures.action: Have you been delaying to keep Yah's commandments? Why or why not?

scriptures.verse: The law of thy mouth is better unto me than thousands of gold and silver.
scriptures.action: Which one is more important to you: The Torah (Law) of Yah or money?

scriptures.verse: Depart from me, ye evildoers: for I will keep the commandments of my God.
scriptures.action: Who is someone around you that you need to depart from you in order for you to grow?

scriptures.verse: My flesh trembleth for fear of thee; and I am afraid of thy judgments.
scriptures.action: Are you afraid of Yah's righteous judgements according to the Torah?

scriptures.verse: I thought on my ways, and turned my feet unto thy testimonies.
scriptures.action: What is one way you can turn your feet back to the testimony of Yah?

scriptures.verse: I hate and abhor lying: but thy law do I love.
scriptures.action: When was the last time you lied? Why?

scriptures.verse: For whosoever shall keep the whole law, and yet offend in one point, he is guilty of all.
scriptures.action: Find a law you are not keeping a make an action plan to keep it today.

scriptures.verse: Can the fig tree, my brethren, bear olive berries? either a vine, figs? so can no fountain both yield salt water and fresh
scriptures.action: Read this scripture carefully. How is this being exemplified in your life?

scriptures.verse: This wisdom descendeth not from above, but is earthly, sensual, devilish.
scriptures.action: Is some of the wisdom you are holding onto earthly? What is the heavenly alternative?

scriptures.verse: For where envying and strife is, there is confusion and every evil work.
scriptures.action: How can you eliminate envying and strife in your life?

scriptures.verse: Submit yourselves therefore to Elohim. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
scriptures.action: How can you resist the devil today to cause him to flee from you?

scriptures.verse: Humble yourselves in the sight of Yahuah, and he shall lift you up.
scriptures.action: verse 2 ways you can minimize your pride and humble yourself before Yah?

scriptures.verse: I thought on my ways, and turned my feet unto thy testimonies.
scriptures.action: What is one way you can turn your feet back to the testimonies of Yah?

scriptures.verse: Therefore to him that knoweth to do good, and doeth it not, to him it is sin.
scriptures.action: Familiarize yourself with Leviticus and Deuteronomy to become more aware of Yah's laws.

scriptures.verse: Then Yahushua said unto them, 'Yet a little while is the light with you. Walk while ye have the light, lest, darkness come upon you; for he that walks in darkness knows not where he goes'
scriptures.action: We know that the commandments are a lamp, and the Torah (Law) is the light. Let's let those guide us in darkness.

scriptures.verse: For Yahuah your Elohim is he that goes with you, to fight for you against your enemies, to save you.
scriptures.action: Remember that Yah is with you, if you keep his commandments. Trust that he will fight your battles for you.
